title: Austin’s Extraordinary Playlist
description:
Nikki talks to TV writer and producer Austin Winsberg about his work, his inspiration, and how he turned heartache into a whimsical, uplifting and meaningful hit TV show.

Watch Zoey’s Extraordinary Playlist on NBC

Follow Austin Winsberg on Twitter: @austinwinsberg

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
